trans-unit.resname: OARC·1★ | All in Good Time | Card Name
trans-unit.source: All in Good Time
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·1★ | All in Good Time | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, take an extra turn after this one. Schemes can't be set in motion that turn.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·1★ | All in Good Time | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Take a moment. Ponder the depths of your insignificance."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·2★ | All Shall Smolder in My Wake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: All Shall Smolder in My Wake
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·2★ | All Shall Smolder in My Wake | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to one target artifact, up to one target enchantment, and up to one target nonbasic land.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·2★ | All Shall Smolder in My Wake | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's my goal to find the melting point of every substance."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·3★ | Approach My Molten Realm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Approach My Molten Realm
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·3★ | Approach My Molten Realm | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, if a source would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·3★ | Approach My Molten Realm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's a dragon-infested lavascape of notorious peril. Make yourselves at home."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·4★ | Behold the Power of Destruction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Behold the Power of Destruction
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·4★ | Behold the Power of Destruction | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy all nonland permanents target opponent controls.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·4★ | Behold the Power of Destruction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I'd call that a successful first test. Golem! Rearm the Doom Citadel!"

trans-unit.resname: OARC·5★ | Choose Your Champion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Choose Your Champion
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·5★ | Choose Your Champion | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a player. Until your next turn, only you and the chosen player can cast spells and attack with creatures.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·5★ | Choose Your Champion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It seems the fate of the world rests on your shoulders, feeble child."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·6★ | Dance, Pathetic Marionette | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dance, Pathetic Marionette
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·6★ | Dance, Pathetic Marionette | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. Choose one of the revealed creature cards and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Put all other cards revealed this way into their owners' graveyards.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·7★ | The Dead Shall Serve | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Dead Shall Serve
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·7★ | The Dead Shall Serve | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Each of those creatures attacks its owner each combat if able.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·7★ | The Dead Shall Serve | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tell your old master I said hello."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·8★ | A Display of My Dark Power | Card Name
trans-unit.source: A Display of My Dark Power
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·8★ | A Display of My Dark Power | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·8★ | A Display of My Dark Power | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What would you say is my greatest attribute? Is it my gluttonous lust for power?"

trans-unit.resname: OARC·9★ | Embrace My Diabolical Vision | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Embrace My Diabolical Vision
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·9★ | Embrace My Diabolical Vision | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You draw seven cards, then each other player draws four cards.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·9★ | Embrace My Diabolical Vision | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My vision is for the good of everyone. Mostly me."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·10★ | Every Hope Shall Vanish | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Every Hope Shall Vanish
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·10★ | Every Hope Shall Vanish | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a nonland card from each of those hands. Those players discard those cards.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·10★ | Every Hope Shall Vanish | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Oh, I think I *will* get away with this."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·11★ | Every Last Vestige Shall Rot | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Every Last Vestige Shall Rot
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·11★ | Every Last Vestige Shall Rot | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, put each nonland permanent target player controls with converted mana cost X or less on the bottom of its owner's library.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·11★ | Every Last Vestige Shall Rot | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "May bloodberries grow from your remains."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·12★ | Evil Comes to Fruition | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evil Comes to Fruition
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·12★ | Evil Comes to Fruition | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, put seven 0/1 green Plant creature tokens onto the battlefield. If you control ten or more lands, put seven 3/3 green Elemental creature tokens onto the battlefield instead.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·12★ | Evil Comes to Fruition | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The plants justify the means."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·13★ | The Fate of the Flammable | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Fate of the Flammable
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·13★ | The Fate of the Flammable | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, this scheme deals 6 damage to him or her. If the player chooses others, this scheme deals 3 damage to each of your other opponents.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·14★ | Feed the Machine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feed the Machine
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·14★ | Feed the Machine | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, he or she sacrifices two creatures. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a creature.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·14★ | Feed the Machine | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Even you have a purpose. Your blood will oil the gears."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·15★ | I Bask in Your Silent Awe | Card Name
trans-unit.source: I Bask in Your Silent Awe
trans-unit.target: 吾沉浸于汝之无声敬畏
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·15★ | I Bask in Your Silent Awe | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Each opponent can't cast more than one spell each turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, if no opponent cast a spell since your last turn ended, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·16★ | I Call on the Ancient Magics | Card Name
trans-unit.source: I Call on the Ancient Magics
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·16★ | I Call on the Ancient Magics | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each other player searches his or her library for a card, reveals it, and puts it into his or her hand. Then you search your library for two cards and put them into your hand. Each player shuffles his or her library.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·17★ | I Delight in Your Convulsions | Card Name
trans-unit.source: I Delight in Your Convulsions
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·17★ | I Delight in Your Convulsions | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·17★ | I Delight in Your Convulsions | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I can't imagine what you're feeling right now, but I'll try my best."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·18★ | I Know All, I See All | Card Name
trans-unit.source: I Know All, I See All
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·18★ | I Know All, I See All | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Untap all permanents you control during each opponent's untap step. At the beginning of each end step, if three or more cards were put into your graveyard this turn from anywhere, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·19★ | Ignite the Cloneforge! | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ignite the Cloneforge!
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·19★ | Ignite the Cloneforge! | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of target permanent an opponent controls.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·19★ | Ignite the Cloneforge! | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Heroes innovate. Villains duplicate."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·20★ | Into the Earthen Maw | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Into the Earthen Maw
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·20★ | Into the Earthen Maw | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, exile up to one target creature with flying, up to one target creature without flying, and all cards from up to one target opponent's graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·20★ | Into the Earthen Maw | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You may even see them again. Full digestion takes three hundred years."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·21★ | Introductions Are in Order | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Introductions Are in Order
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·21★ | Introductions Are in Order | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, choose one — Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library; or you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·21★ | Introductions Are in Order | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Meet my newest minion. Come now, don't be shy—shake her pincer."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·22★ | The Iron Guardian Stirs | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Iron Guardian Stirs
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·22★ | The Iron Guardian Stirs | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, put a 4/6 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·22★ | The Iron Guardian Stirs | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It would be disappointing if you were unable to overcome this simplest of defenses. Hilarious, but disappointing."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·23★ | Know Naught but Fire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Know Naught but Fire
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·23★ | Know Naught but Fire | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·23★ | Know Naught but Fire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Cranial explosions for everyone. Still planning to outthink my dragons?"

trans-unit.resname: OARC·24★ | Look Skyward and Despair | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Look Skyward and Despair
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·24★ | Look Skyward and Despair | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·24★ | Look Skyward and Despair | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Today I take the reins of destiny itself. Today the Draconic Apocalypse is upon you."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·25★ | May Civilization Collapse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: May Civilization Collapse
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·25★ | May Civilization Collapse | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, he or she sacrifices two lands. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a land.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·25★ | May Civilization Collapse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This should halt the spread of your insolence."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·26★ | Mortal Flesh Is Weak | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mortal Flesh Is Weak
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·26★ | Mortal Flesh Is Weak | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent's life total becomes the lowest life total among your opponents.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·26★ | Mortal Flesh Is Weak | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I certainly would have accepted my offer of eternal life. But if you choose death instead, who am I to argue?"

trans-unit.resname: OARC·27★ | My Crushing Masterstroke | Card Name
trans-unit.source: My Crushing Masterstroke
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·27★ | My Crushing Masterstroke | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of all nonland permanents your opponents control until end of turn. Untap those permanents. They gain haste until end of turn. Each of them attacks its owner this turn if able.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·28★ | My Genius Knows No Bounds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: My Genius Knows No Bounds
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·28★ | My Genius Knows No Bounds | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·28★ | My Genius Knows No Bounds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I can see . . . everything. The beginning and the end of time. The raw edges of reality. And now I see exactly how to kill you."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·29★ | My Undead Horde Awakens | Card Name
trans-unit.source: My Undead Horde Awakens
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·29★ | My Undead Horde Awakens | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) At the beginning of your end step, you may put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When a creature put onto the battlefield with this scheme is put into a graveyard, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·30★ | My Wish Is Your Command | Card Name
trans-unit.source: My Wish Is Your Command
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·30★ | My Wish Is Your Command | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals his or her hand. You may choose a noncreature, nonland card revealed this way and cast it without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·30★ | My Wish Is Your Command | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Indulge me. Just one spell. One potentially fatal spell gone horribly awry."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·31★ | Nature Demands an Offering | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nature Demands an Offering
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·31★ | Nature Demands an Offering | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a creature you don't control and puts it on top of its owner's library, then repeats this process for an artifact, an enchantment, and a land. Then the owner of each permanent chosen this way shuffles his or her library.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·32★ | Nature Shields Its Own | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nature Shields Its Own
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·32★ | Nature Shields Its Own | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Whenever a creature attacks and isn't blocked, if you're the defending player, put a 0/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield blocking that creature. When four or more creatures attack you, abandon this scheme at end of combat.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·33★ | Nothing Can Stop Me Now | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nothing Can Stop Me Now
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·33★ | Nothing Can Stop Me Now | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) If a source an opponent controls would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage. At the beginning of each end step, if you've been dealt 5 or more damage this turn, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·34★ | Only Blood Ends Your Nightmares | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Only Blood Ends Your Nightmares
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·34★ | Only Blood Ends Your Nightmares | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. Then each opponent who didn't sacrifice a creature discards two cards.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·34★ | Only Blood Ends Your Nightmares | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "But nothing will end your regret."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·35★ | The Pieces Are Coming Together | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Pieces Are Coming Together
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·35★ | The Pieces Are Coming Together | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. Artifact spells you cast this turn cost {2} less to cast.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·35★ | The Pieces Are Coming Together | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Cretins build machines. I construct destiny."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·36★ | Realms Befitting My Majesty | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Realms Befitting My Majesty
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·36★ | Realms Befitting My Majesty | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·36★ | Realms Befitting My Majesty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Look around you. All you behold is mine to rule. It's the natural way."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·37★ | Roots of All Evil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Roots of All Evil
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·37★ | Roots of All Evil | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, put five 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·37★ | Roots of All Evil | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I assure you, these are not the kind that thrive on sunlight and water."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·38★ | Rotted Ones, Lay Siege | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rotted Ones, Lay Siege
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·38★ | Rotted Ones, Lay Siege | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield that attacks that player each combat if able.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·38★ | Rotted Ones, Lay Siege | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Don't come back until you've got brains in your teeth."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·39★ | Surrender Your Thoughts | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Surrender Your Thoughts
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·39★ | Surrender Your Thoughts | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, he or she discards four cards. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents discards two cards.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·39★ | Surrender Your Thoughts | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Or, if you prefer, just surrender."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·40★ | Tooth, Claw, and Tail | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tooth, Claw, and Tail
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·40★ | Tooth, Claw, and Tail | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to three target nonland permanents.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·40★ | Tooth, Claw, and Tail | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Silence your wailing. This is but a taste of the destruction my pets have in store."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·41★ | The Very Soil Shall Shake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Very Soil Shall Shake
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·41★ | The Very Soil Shall Shake | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample. When a creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·42★ | Which of You Burns Brightest? | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Which of You Burns Brightest?
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·42★ | Which of You Burns Brightest? | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, this scheme deals X damage to target opponent and each creature he or she controls.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·42★ | Which of You Burns Brightest? | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let that be a lesson to you, your family, and everyone you've ever known."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·43★ | Your Fate Is Thrice Sealed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Your Fate Is Thrice Sealed
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·43★ | Your Fate Is Thrice Sealed | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·43★ | Your Fate Is Thrice Sealed | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I can't abide laziness. Arise, forces of nature, and serve your master!"

trans-unit.resname: OARC·44★ | Your Puny Minds Cannot Fathom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Your Puny Minds Cannot Fathom
trans-unit.target: 汝之弱小心灵无法理解
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·44★ | Your Puny Minds Cannot Fathom | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, draw four cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·44★ | Your Puny Minds Cannot Fathom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have seen far beyond this imperfect world, into a tomorrow that doesn't include you."

trans-unit.resname: OARC·45★ | Your Will Is Not Your Own | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Your Will Is Not Your Own
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OARC·45★ | Your Will Is Not Your Own | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +3/+3 and gains haste and trample until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: OARC·45★ | Your Will Is Not Your Own | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Fool. I'll show you how to use that thing."
